00011 #include "Jamoma.h"
00012 #include "scheduler.h"
00013 
00014 static t_symbol *ps_granularity;
00015 
00016 
00017 t_linear_sched* create(rampunit_method_callback_type in_callback, void *in_baton)
00018 {
00019         t_linear_sched *rampunit = (t_linear_sched *)malloc(sizeof(t_linear_sched));
00020         if(rampunit){
00021                 ps_granularity = gensym("granularity");                                                 // cache attr names for speed
00022 
00023                 rampunit->callback = in_callback;
00024                 rampunit->baton = in_baton;
00025                 rampunit->max_clock = clock_new(rampunit, (method)&tick);               // install the max timer
00026                 rampunit->numvalues = 0;
00027                 rampunit->value_current = NULL;
00028                 rampunit->value_target = NULL;
00029                 rampunit->stepsize = NULL;
00030                 rampunit->function = NULL;
00031                 rampunit->functionName = NULL;
00032                 setnumvalues(rampunit, 1);
00033                 rampunit->value_current[0] = 0;
00034                 
00035                 attrset(rampunit, ps_granularity, 20.0);
00036                 setFunction(rampunit, gensym("linear"));
00037         }
00038         return rampunit;
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 void destroy(t_linear_sched *rampunit)
00043 {
00044         clock_unset(rampunit->max_clock);
00045         freeobject((t_object *)rampunit->max_clock);
00046         free(rampunit->value_current);
00047         free(rampunit->value_target);
00048         free(rampunit->value_start);
00049         if(rampunit->function)
00050                 delete rampunit->function;
00051         free(rampunit);
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 JamomaError setFunction(t_linear_sched *rampunit, t_symbol *functionName)
00056 {
00057         JamomaError     err = JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00058         if(functionName != rampunit->functionName){
00059                 err = jamoma_getFunction(functionName, &rampunit->function);
00060                 if(!err){
00061                         rampunit->functionName = functionName;
00062                 }
00063         }
00064         return err;
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 JamomaError getFunction(t_linear_sched *rampunit, t_symbol **functionName)
00069 {
00070         *functionName = rampunit->functionName;
00071         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 JamomaError setFunctionParameter(t_linear_sched *rampunit, t_symbol *parameterName, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00076 {
00077         return rampunit->function->setParameter(parameterName, argc, argv);
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 JamomaError getFunctionParameter(t_linear_sched *rampunit, t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00082 {
00083         return rampunit->function->getParameter(parameterName, argc, argv);
00084 }

00086 
00087 ramp_err attrset(t_linear_sched *rampunit, t_symbol *attrname, double value)
00088 {
00089         if(attrname == ps_granularity)
00090                 rampunit->granularity = value;
00091         else
00092                 return RAMP_ERR_ATTR_INVALID;
00093 
00094         return RAMP_ERR_NONE;
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 ramp_err attrget(t_linear_sched *rampunit, t_symbol *attrname, double *value)
00099 {
00100         if(attrname = ps_granularity)
00101                 *value = rampunit->granularity;
00102         else
00103                 return RAMP_ERR_ATTR_INVALID;
00104 
00105         return RAMP_ERR_NONE;
00106 }

00108 
00109 //void go(t_linear_sched *rampunit, float value, double time)
00110 void go(t_linear_sched *rampunit, short numvalues, double *values, double time)
00111 {
00112         short   i;
00113 
00114         rampunit->ramptime = time;
00115         rampunit->numgrains = rampunit->ramptime / rampunit->granularity;
00116         rampunit->stepsize = 1.0 / rampunit->numgrains;
00117 
00118         setnumvalues(rampunit, numvalues);
00119         for(i=0; i<numvalues; i++){
00120                 rampunit->value_target[i] = values[i];
00121                 rampunit->value_start[i] = rampunit->value_current[i];
00122         }
00123         rampunit->value = 0.0;                                                  // set the ramp to the beginning
00124         setclock_fdelay(NULL, rampunit->max_clock, 0);  // start now
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 //void set(t_linear_sched *rampunit, double value)
00129 void set(t_linear_sched *rampunit, short numvalues, double *values)
00130 {
00131         short i;
00132 
00133         clock_unset(rampunit->max_clock);
00134         setnumvalues(rampunit, numvalues);
00135         for(i=0; i<numvalues; i++)
00136                 rampunit->value_current[i] = values[i];
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 void stop(t_linear_sched *rampunit)
00141 {
00142         clock_unset(rampunit->max_clock);
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 void tick(t_linear_sched *rampunit)
00147 {
00148         short   i;
00149         double  mapped;
00150         double  *current = rampunit->value_current;
00151         double  *target = rampunit->value_target;
00152         double  *start = rampunit->value_start;
00153 
00154         // 1. go to the the next step in our ramp
00155         rampunit->numgrains--;
00156         if(rampunit->numgrains == 0){
00157                 for(i=0; i < rampunit->numvalues; i++)
00158                         rampunit->value_current[i] = rampunit->value_target[i];
00159         }
00160         else{
00161                 rampunit->value += rampunit->stepsize;
00162                 mapped = rampunit->function->mapValue(rampunit->value);
00163                 for(i=0; i < rampunit->numvalues; i++)
00164                         current[i] = start[i] + ((target[i] - start[i]) * mapped);
00165         }
00166         
00167         // 2. send the value to the host
00168         (rampunit->callback)(rampunit->baton, rampunit->numvalues, rampunit->value_current);
00169 
00170         // 3. set the clock to fire again
00171         if(rampunit->numgrains)
00172                 setclock_fdelay(NULL, rampunit->max_clock, rampunit->granularity);
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 // PRIVATE METHOD: memory allocation
00177 void setnumvalues(t_linear_sched *rampunit, short numvalues)
00178 {
00179         if(numvalues != rampunit->numvalues){
00180                 if(rampunit->numvalues == 0){
00181                         rampunit->value_start = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00182                         rampunit->value_current = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00183                         rampunit->value_target = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00184                 }
00185                 else{
00186                         rampunit->value_start = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_start, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00187                         rampunit->value_current = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_current, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00188                         rampunit->value_target = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_target, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00189                 }
00190                 rampunit->numvalues = numvalues;
00191         }       
00192 }
